item.title: Shelby add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you always do what interests you, at least one person is pleased." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Katherine Hepburn
item.description: "If you want to change attitudes, start with a change in behavior." -- Katherine Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Katherine Hepburn
item.description: "If you need a helping hand, you can find one at the end of your arm." -- Katherine Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Katherine Hepburn
item.description: "I never lose sight of the fact that just being is fun." -- Katherine Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Katherine Hepburn
item.description: "Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get — only what you are expecting to give — which is everything. What you will receive in return varies. But it really has no connection with what you give. You give because you love and cannot help giving." -- Katherine Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Shelby add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Shelby add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shelby add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Shelby add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "When one tugs at a single thing in nature, he finds it attached to the rest of the world." -- John Muir

item.title: Shelby add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "In every walk with Nature one receives far more than he seeks." -- John Muir

item.title: Shelby add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "Most people who travel look only at what they are directed to look at. Great is the power of the guidebook maker, however ignorant." -- John Muir

item.title: Shelby add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "The sun shines not on us but in us." -- John Muir

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus
